column1: #Text=The Apple Watch will remind you periodically.
#Text='Time to stand up and move for one minute.'
#Text=This is odd, because in all other ways the device seems designed to ensure that your limbs atrophy and fall off.
#Text='----------------Another Saturday start made more tolerable with the imagery in this and other paragraphs.
#Text=The best humour is indeed based on exaggeration, as Gable and Renzetti demonstrate, so very well.
